description: This file defines an Angular standalone component named AdminSettingsComponent that provides a user interface for platform administrators to view and modify various platform settings such as public explore access, email verification, and maintenance mode.

classes.name: AdminSettingsComponent
classes.description: Angular component that manages platform administrative settings including form controls for toggling features and handling save/reset actions.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initializes the component and loads current settings from the server.

methods.name: reload
methods.description: Fetches the latest admin settings from the backend and updates the form fields.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves the current form values as settings to the backend and displays success or error messages.

ctags.name: payload
ctags.pattern: /^    const payload = this.form.getRawValue() as Record<string, any>;$/
